section.name: UI Additions
section.description: Section of User Interface Additions. These patches do not change any original game rules or limitations.

boolean.name: UIA features
boolean.description: Enable features from User Interface Additions - Mouse wheel and middle button support - Ability to choose any unit in stack beyond limit of 9 - Work counter for Settlers/Engineers is displayed - Click-bounds of specialists sprites corrected in city screen - Number of the game turn is displayed - Current research numbers are displayed in Science Advisor - CD Music: correct CD-tracks looping and play progress display

boolean.name: 64-bit patch
boolean.description: This eliminates game crashes on 64-bit systems when the game tries to display edit controls (input fields) for entering text (like city name, emperor name, world sizes etc.).

boolean.name: Disable CD Check
boolean.description: When enabled, allow the application to run without the game CD.

section.name: civ2patch
section.description: Section of some fixes and enhancements from civ2patch project by vinceho https://github.com/vinceho/civ2patch These patches change some game rules or limitations.

boolean.name: Hostile AI
boolean.description: When enabled, AI will not be unreasonably hostile to the player.

boolean.name: Retirement year
boolean.description: When enabled, allow the retirement year to be modified.

boolean.name: Population limit
boolean.description: When enabled, allow the population limit to be modified.

boolean.name: Gold limit
boolean.description: When enabled, allow the gold limit to be modified.

boolean.name: Map size limit
boolean.description: When enabled, allow the number of map tiles limit to be modified.
